description: Deploy a formation with a whirling tornado, gathering enemies at the tornado eye and dealing 20 x 160% ATK of Physical DMG in total. Reduces incoming DMG by 20% and increases Ignore Interrupt for 15s. Increases deployed Valkyries' Physical DMG by 25% for 18s. With Starlit Astrologos, Physical DMG dealt by deployed Valkyries' Ultimate and Burst Mode increases 15%.
